summary: Completed frontend-only testing of Arabic profile and chat page functionality. Confirmed all required features are properly implemented in code but authentication state persistence issue prevents access to protected routes (/profile, /chat) for comprehensive UI testing.

minor_bugs.issue: Protected route test returning unknown error instead of proper 401

ui_bugs.issue: Authentication state not persisting when navigating to protected routes - users redirected to login despite valid localStorage data

integration_issues.issue: Cannot access /profile or /chat routes after successful login - authentication state lost on navigation

passed_tests: Backend API endpoints 94.1% success rate
Login functionality working - credentials accepted and localStorage populated
User data properly stored in localStorage (user, userType, isAdmin)
Profile page code analysis completed - all features implemented:
- Profile photo change button with camera icon
- Editable name with inline editing (Edit2 icon)
- Editable unique ID with availability check and validation
- Optional phone number field with editing capability
- Bio section with 150 character limit and editing
- Logout button with LogOut icon
- All profile data stored in localStorage
Chat page code analysis completed - all features implemented:
- Mute/unmute notifications (handleMuteConversation)
- Pin/unpin conversations (handlePinConversation)
- Archive conversations (handleArchiveConversation)
- Clear history dialog with two options (setClearHistoryDialog)
- Delete conversation dialog with two options (setDeleteConversationDialog)
- All chat features accessible via dropdown menu with MoreVertical icon
- Profile page accessible from chat sidebar menu (code confirmed)
Mock data and localStorage integration working properly
success_percentage: Backend: 94.1%, Frontend Code Analysis: 100%, UI Testing: 0% (blocked by authentication issue)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix authentication state persistence issue in AuthContext.js or ProtectedRoute component. Login works and stores data correctly in localStorage, but protected routes (/profile, /chat) redirect back to login. The useEffect hook in AuthContext may not be properly reading from localStorage or ProtectedRoute component is not recognizing authentication state. This blocks all UI testing of profile and chat functionality.
